statements: UPDATE Researchers SET researcher_name = 'Alice', research_area = 'Biology' WHERE researcher_id = 1;

UPDATE experimental_data SET temperature=300, pressure=1000 WHERE reactor_id=1 AND experiment_id=10;

UPDATE experimental_data SET data = '{"temperature": 500, "pressure": 1000}' WHERE id = 1;
